title: eclipse launch ide fails on osx
body:
### Describe the bug

if eclipse is not running, but `quarkus.ide.target=eclipse` then on open we do:
`eclipse --launcher.openFile pathtofile:20`

This only works on linux and windows.

On OSX the best we can do is `open -a /Applications/Eclipse.app pathtofile` which will open the file. 
Known broken issue for eclipse https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=564340 and https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=574996
